changeSet.author: yinlf
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `etl_error_log` ADD COLUMN `ERR_VALUE` varchar(50) COMMENT '发生错误列的值' AFTER `ERR_COLUMN`, ADD COLUMN `DIAGNOSE_RESULT` varchar(255) COMMENT '程序诊断结果' AFTER `ERR_VALUE`, ADD COLUMN `IS_SOLVE` char(1) COMMENT '是否已解决' AFTER `DIAGNOSE_RESULT`;

changeSet.author: yinlf
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `etl_job_log` ( `job_log_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键', `job_log_code` varchar(255) COMMENT '上传批次', `read_num` int(11) COMMENT '读取数据', `written_num` int(11) COMMENT '写入数据', `error_num` int(11) COMMENT '发生错误数', `solve_num` int(11) COMMENT '已解决数', `start_time` datetime(0) COMMENT '开始时间', `end_time` datetime(0) COMMENT '结束时间', `create_time` datetime(0) COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`job_log_id`) USING BTREE ) COMMENT = '定时上传执行日志' ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic; CREATE TABLE `etl_job_detail_log` ( `detail_log_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键', `job_log_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '上传记录ID', `table_name` varchar(50) not null COMMENT '上传表名', `read_num` int(11) COMMENT '读取数据', `written_num` int(11) COMMENT '写入数据', `error_num` int(11) COMMENT '发生错误数', `create_time` datetime(0) COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`detail_log_id`) USING BTREE, CONSTRAINT `fk_detail_log_job_log` FOREIGN KEY (`job_log_id`) REFERENCES `etl_job_log` (`job_log_id`) ) COMMENT = '定时上传执行详细日志' ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic; ALTER TABLE `etl_error_log` ADD COLUMN `job_log_id` int(11) COMMENT '执行JOB的ID' AFTER `LOG_ID`, ADD CONSTRAINT `FK_ERROR_LOG_JOB_LOB` FOREIGN KEY (`job_log_id`) REFERENCES `etl_job_log` (`job_log_id`);
